SqlTable.SqlScriptCreate: CREATE TABLE [dbo].[CoreEmailQueue] ( [CoreEmailQueue_Ky] int IDENTITY(1,1) NOT NULL , [CoreEmailQueue_From] varchar(MAX) NULL , [CoreEmailQueue_To] varchar(MAX) NULL , [CoreEmailQueue_Cc] varchar(MAX) NULL , [CoreEmailQueue_Ccn] varchar(MAX) NULL , [CoreEmailQueue_Subject] varchar(MAX) NULL , [CoreEmailQueue_Body] varchar(MAX) NULL , [CoreEmailQueue_Sent] bit NULL , [CoreEmailQueue_SentData] datetime NULL , [CoreEmailQueue_UserInsert] int NULL , [CoreEmailQueue_UserUpdate] int NULL , [CoreEmailQueue_UserDelete] int NULL , [CoreEmailQueue_DateInsert] datetime NULL , [CoreEmailQueue_DateUpdate] datetime NULL , [CoreEmailQueue_DateDelete] datetime NULL ) ALTER TABLE [dbo].[CoreEmailQueue] ADD CONSTRAINT PK_CoreEmailQueue PRIMARY KEY ([CoreEmailQueue_Ky])
